full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-AJN Document 763 Filed 08/10/22 Page 93 of 197 2634 LCHCmax3 Dubin - direct 1 Q. And were you or are you licensed to practice medicine in the State of New York? 2 A. I am. 3 Q. Just briefly, where did you attend medical school? 4 A. I attended medical school at the Karolinska Institute in 5 Stockholm for three and a half years, and then UCLA medical 6 school. 7 Q. And did you graduate from UCLA medical school? 8 A. Yes, I did. 9 Q. Did you complete a residency for internal medicine? 10 A. Yes, I did. 11 Q. And where did you complete your residency for internal 12 medicine? 13 14 A. In Lennox Hill Hospital. 15 Q. Here in New York? 16 A. Yes. 17 Q. I want to ask you some questions about a man named Jeffrey 18 Epstein. Did you know Mr. Epstein? 19 A. Yes, I did. 20 Q. And how did you know Mr. Epstein? 21 A. We dated off and on from the start of 1983. 22 Q. So 1983 until approximately when did you date Mr. Epstein 23 off and on? 24 A. Approximately 1990, 1991. 25 Q. Okay. And after you stopped dating Mr. Epstein in SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00016822
